description:
Smartwatches are a great way to stay connected without having to constantly look at your phone. But they typically cost a premium price. This week only, however, you can get the MagPRO Smartwatch with Magnetic Band & Activity Tracker for $110 off.

This customizable smartwatch is full of features that you’d expect from a leading model. It stays synced with your phone to deliver incoming messages, works as a remote control for your phone to take pictures, and tracks a host of activity and w
title: Get a smartwatch for just $40 this week only

description:
If you recently bought a new computer or are just looking to upgrade your old rig, you’re going to want some professional software to help it shine. This deal for a one-year subscription to both Microsoft 365 Personal and NordVPN will help get your computer into shape.

Microsoft 365 gives you the productivity tools you need to stay on top of your work and personal tasks. You’ll get access to all of the household names such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. Plus, since Microsoft 365 switched to a cloud-based subscription plan, you’ll always have access to the most updated versions of the apps no matter where you are.

NordVPN is one of the best VPNs on the market today
title: Score a year of NordVPN and Microsoft 365 Personal for only $35
